author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

scripts.build-push: npm run build && git add build && npx git-flush-cli 'Rebuilt src/'
scripts.testOnGithub: name=$(package-name-cli) && git-flush-cli 'Testing changes' && npm run buildPush && cd ../test && git pull && echo $(date-now) >> changefile.txt && git-flush-cli 'Random commit for testing action Jaid/$name' && cd ../$name
scripts.buildPush: npm run build && git add build && git-flush-cli 'Rebuilt src/'

description: GitHub Action that ensures my Node projects use an up-to-date boilerplate setup.
name: action-uptodater
